description: A Spring Boot REST controller defining several API endpoints including a welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and application info, using Swagger annotations for API documentation.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: Spring Boot REST controller providing basic API endpoints with Swagger annotations for documentation.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message at the root path '/'

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI for API documentation, preserving request URL scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' string indicating application health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns application information, specifically the project name.
